item.description:
Hey all, I am running the New York City Marathon this year, raising money for the BARKA Foundation - www.barkafoundation.org. Check out my website at www.howardsimpson.com. They help create wells for access to clean water in Burkina Faso, Africa - one of the poorest nations on the planet.

Due to some last-minute shuffling, there is AT LEAST ONE, possibly more open spaces on this small team. There is a fundraising commitment to be made, but there is still plenty of time to get the word out, and while I can't list specifics here, the fund-raising commitment is WAY LOWER than the big-name charities for this kind of race, so if you haven't tried fundraising before now might be your chance to try, for a great cause, and it without all the huge liability can bring.

Shoot them an e-mail at: inaandesu@barkafoundation.org for more information! Again, ASAP. I will take this down when I hear the spots are filled.

Thanks!

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Open Spots on Team to Run the 2012 New York City Marathon! To be filled ASAP!
